    • RMQ

      public RMQ(int[] a)
      given array of values in a, build internal datastructure to handle minimum within index range queries. The r.t.c. of constructor is O(n) where n = a.length.
      Parameters:
      a -

  • Method Details

    • min

      public int[] min(int[][] queries)
      given an array of queries, where a query is an index range, return an array of the indices of the minimum values in a for the queries. The r.t.c. is O(queries.length).
      Parameters:
      queries - an array of queries in format queries[0] = [index0_0, index0_1], queries[1] = [index1_0, index1_1], etc.
      Returns:

    • min

      public int min(int[] query)
      given a query array holding 2 indices as an index range of array 'a', return the index of the minimum value in array 'a' for the query index range. The r.t.c. is O(1).
      Parameters:
      query - query in format [index0, index1]
      Returns:
